title: Prioritize Tasks Democratically
description: Implement a voting system to prioritize tasks
published: true

# Open Source Voting Tools

We should use the "wisdom of crowds" to priortize resources in a manner that maximizes impact per resources required.

Examples of voting mechanisms:
<dt>
        <dl><p>
            </p><dt><a href="https://github.com/anish-agnihotri/quadratic-voting" add_date="1639168942" icon="data:image/png;base64,">Anish-Agnihotri/quadratic-voting: Real-time Quadratic Voting dashboard to encourage mathematically optimal voting in democratic communities.</a>
            </dt><dt><a 
href="https://quadraticvote.co/place" add_date="1639168978" icon="data:image/png;base64,">QuadraticVote.co - EZ QV Tool</a>
            </dt><dt><a href="https://www.democracy-deutschland.de/#!prototyp" add_date="1639169155" icon="data:image/png;base64,">DEMOCRACY App</a>
            </dt><dt><a href="https://github.com/demokratie-live/democracy-client" add_date="1639169179" icon="data:image/png;base64,">demokratie-live/democracy-client: DEMOCRACY App Client</a>
            </dt><dt><a href="https://janosgyerik.github.io/upvotejs/" add_date="1639169285">UpvoteJS</a>
            </dt><dt><a href="https://github.com/janosgyerik/upvotejs" add_date="1639169290" icon="data:image/png;base64,">janosgyerik/upvotejs: UpvoteJS generates a voting widget like the one used on Stack Exchange sites</a>
            </dt><dt><a href="https://github.com/evenchange4/gh-polls-bot" add_date="1639169496" icon="data:image/png;base64,">evenchange4/gh-polls-bot: Automatically create polls in GitHub issues.</a>
            </dt><dt><a href="https://github.com/bukinoshita/gh-polls" add_date="1639169559" icon="data:image/png;base64,">bukinoshita/gh-polls: Create a poll with gh-polls</a>
        </dt></dl><p>
    </p></dt>
